abstract.text: Structure containing the methods related to the Apple Music catalog.

inlineContent.text: provides an interface for interacting with the Apple Music catalog.
It includes methods for searching, fetching, and managing catalog items like songs, albums, playlists, and more.

code: // Fetch a song by its identifier
let results = try await MCatalog.search(for: "the weeknd", types: [.songs, .albums])
